title: Is Tadej Pogačar the Modern ‘GOAT’? Paris-Roubaix Will Be Decisive
content:
'Scary how much better he is': Peloton in shock after Pogačar tore their legs off in Tour of Flanders, but Roubaix will put notion of 'greatest of all time' to a far tougher test.

Read the full article at Is Tadej Pogačar the Modern ‘GOAT’? Paris-Roubaix Will Be Decisive on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
